thread.title: Police: 2 women arrested after fight on JetBlue flight
thread.title_full: Police: 2 women arrested after fight on JetBlue flight

author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
title: Police: 2 women arrested after fight on JetBlue flight
text:
Police: 2 women arrested after fight with knife, pepper spray on JetBlue flight in New York 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 8/26/15 2:13 pm EDT - Updated: 8/26/15 2:15 pm EDT 
NEW YORK â€” Two women have been arrested after police say they attacked each other as their flight arrived at New York's Kennedy Airport from Jamaica. 
Port Authority spokesman Joe Pentangelo (pehn-TAN'-jeh-loh) says it happened at 8:45 a.m. Wednesday. 
The dispute started after a 61-year-old passenger at a window seat tried to climb over another woman as Jet Blue Flight 960 approached the gate. 
The older woman used an eyebrow razor to slash the 52-year-old woman and a man who tried to intervene. 
The younger woman then used pepper-spray on the knife-wielding passenger. 
Seven passengers were treated for difficulty breathing. 
Police say the 61-year-old was arrested on assault and weapons charges. The other woman was arrested for possessing pepper spray.
